elements.text: You're sitting on a bench and getting some fresh air when you notice your arms start moving. Just then, you hear someone call your name and look up to see your neighbors walking by. Despite wondering if they've noticed your movements, you know it is normal for people with your condition, and you continue enjoying the...

elements.name: Enjoying the outdoors_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
